# Fusion Humanoids

> Official distributor of Unitree robots in Ireland and the UK.

Fusion Humanoids is the official Unitree robotics distributor for Ireland and the United Kingdom. We sell humanoid robots and robot dogs for research, education, and industrial applications.

## Products

- **Unitree G1** – Advanced humanoid robot for research and industry
- **Unitree H1** – High-performance humanoid robot
- **Unitree H2** – Next-generation humanoid robot
- **Unitree Go2** – Agile quadruped robot dog for outdoor and research use
- **Unitree B2** – Heavy-duty industrial quadruped robot

## About

- Based in Co. Meath, Ireland
- Serving Ireland and the UK
- Expert consultation, technical support, and after-sales service
- Contact: sales@fusionhumanoids.com | +353-44-967-2855
